title: Rodney, Daniel & George: 24 Hours Without Power
content: Rodney, Daniel, and George from the men's group share their experience of a 24-hour power outage during the storm. Despite the blackout, they stayed active in community support, helping distribute beds to families in need. The men's group meetings at the police station continued even during crisis, providing stability and support when it was needed most. Their story shows how established community programs become lifelines during disasters.
